attributes.action: Introduce Performance Management Targets for MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Introduce yearly performance targets, and appraisals for all MPs.  

To ensure fairness all objectives and peformance against those objectives to be published to the electorate.  At the end of the appraisal process MPs to be graded. 

Objectives should be SMART and cover both national and local issues. This will give us a accurate view of the performance of the MP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
